title: Aa former West Virginia steel mill is now home to a cutting-edge battery plant - Fast Company
excerpt: Form Energy uses iron-air technology to store energy far longer than a lithium-ion battery can.

title: Turning abandoned mines into batteries | IIASA
excerpt: A novel technique called Underground Gravity Energy Storage turns decommissioned mines into long-term energy storage solutions, thereby supporting the sustainable energy transition.

title: Startup Building Zinc-Based Alternatives to Lithium Batteries Granted $400M
